title: ISic000543. I.Sicily inscription 000543
body:
Facsimile Images

1AELIAEAUG[.]
2CONIUGI
3SANCTISSIMAE
4PAELIUSAUGLIB
5[.]IGR[.]NUS

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL with supplement in line 5 of Manganaro; Gualtherus: AVG; Auria: M · AVG; perhaps: Aug(usti) [l(ibertae)]?
line.5: Auria: ...IGR...NVS...; Gualtherus : ΛIGRANIVS; Manganaro: alternatively [N]igr[ia]nus

English translation

Publius Aelius Nigrianus, freedman of Augustus, (made this) for his most pure wife Aelia Auge

commentary

bibliography

  • Gualtherus 1624 no. 265 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002388
  • Gualtherus 1624 [1625] 49 no. 325 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001931
  • 10.7264 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Manganaro 1988 50 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
